member.name: T:Cosmos.Common.Models.Attributes.ArticleTitleValidation
member.summary: Validates that a title is valid.

remarks.para: This validator checks for the following:

list.item: That the title is not null or empty space.
Ensures the title must be unique.
Prevents titles from being named "root," which is a key word.

remarks.para: Note: This validator will return invalid if it cannot connect to the .
